## Meeting.joinWithMedia() method

Shorthand function to join AND set up media

**Signature:**

```typescript

        mediaSettings: any;
        audioVideoOptions?: any;
    }): any;
```

|  options | { joinOptions?: any; mediaSettings: any; audioVideoOptions?: any; } | _(Optional)_ options to join with media |
